wyapruthiya pasugiyada yapanayedi aarambha kerini.me yatathe diwayina pura wyaptha wa athi siya jalayan nawikaranaya karamin siya supiri wegayen yuthu brodband jalaya eli dakwima edina widuli sandesha ha thorathuru thakshana amathya ranjith siyambaalapitiya mahathage pradhanathwayen sidu kerini.yapanaye di kriyathmaka wana wishalathama thorathuru ha sanniwedana thakshana wyapruthiya meya wana athara, me ha samagami wa yapanayedi shri lanka telikom samagama kalapiya durakathana sanniwedana karyalaya ha nadaththu madhyasthanayak da edina ma aarambha kerini.
